thread.title: BRIEF-At&T Inc. To Explore Initial Public Offering Of Minority Interest In Directv Latin America

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-At&T Inc. To Explore Initial Public Offering Of Minority Interest In Directv Latin America

organizations.name: explore initial public offering of minority interest in directv latin america at&t inc

text:
At&T Inc:
* AT&T INC. TO EXPLORE INITIAL PUBLIC OFFERING OF MINORITY INTEREST IN DIRECTV LATIN AMERICA
* AT&T INC - EXPLORING AN IPO OF MINORITY INTEREST IN LATIN AMERICA ENTERTAINMENT SERVICES BUSINESS, DIRECTV LATIN AMERICA, IN FIRST HALF OF 2018
* AT&T INC - HAS CONFIDENTIALLY FILED A REGISTRATION STATEMENT WITH U.S. REGULATORS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
